title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. J, pt. 727 - Confidential Nature Of Records Of The Commission For The Visually Handicapped
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. J, pt. 727 - Confidential Nature Of Records Of The Commission For The Visually Handicapped

State Regulations
§ 727.1 - Nature of information to be safeguarded
§ 727.2 - Prohibition against disclosure of information
§ 727.3 - Basis for disclosure of information
§ 727.4 - Prohibition against improper use of lists of applicants and clients

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. J, pt. 727

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34; L. 1971, ch. 110, § 83

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
